ActCanada Pension Plan
Old Age Security Act
SubjectTerms and Conditions of an Agreement on Social Security between Canada and Brazil.
PrecisOrder approving the TERMS AND CONDITIONS of the AGREEMENT ON SOCIAL SECURITY between Canada and the FEDERATIVE REPUBLIC OF BRAZIL. The purpose of the Agreement is to coordinate the operation of Canadaâ€™s Old Age Security program and the Canada Pension Plan with the comparable pension programs of Brazil.
